comments.body: Split original ticket into TIMOB-23325, TIMOB-23326, TIMOB-23328, TIMOB-23329, TIMOB-23330 and TIMOB-23331.

Verified using:

OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 10.0.14393
Appc core: 6.0.0-57
Appc NPM: 4.2.8-7
Ti SDK: 6.0.0.v20161006171259
Appc Studio: 4.8.0.201610060953

Code in the description and code in my earlier comment now work as expected and I am able to sent footerView and footerTitle on a TableView

Closing ticket
